metadata.description: Forget what you know about Bomb Queen. 100 years in the future, the world has become a utopian paradise. Governments and religion are at peace, but that tranquility is threatened when Bomb Queen is unleashed out of her slumber, however her return won't come easy when she learns the truth about the new world. A whole new series as shock follows shock for our favorite sovereign. And wait until you see who's joining the cast!
metadata.name: Bomb Queen VII
